column1: The Pit Room////I am so glad this place is here
column2: easily the best bbq in houston (Killens is damn good but not in Houston).  I have been here multiple times and this place is consistently good.  When you are outside of the restaurant you can smell the bbq smoke in the air
column3: a good sign.  There are a couple entrances depending on where you park.  Parking can be somewhat limited but there is street parking in the neighborhood surrounding.
